text:
Usually more of a roast chicken kind of person but this salted chicken had me as a convert!

The meat was falling off the bone, super tender n succulent. My kids who didn't want to eat chicken rice for dinner initially have no complains afterwards. The sauce from the chicken was flavourful and I was slurping it up! Will be ordering for my father's birthday!
Second time ordering, it's that good! Upon opening, I could smell the nice aroma and fragrance coming from the chicken. The meat is tender and tastes absolutely delicious. Highly recommended!
Love the steam chicken set! Green sambal tastes so good!

Ordered the steam chicken set for dinner last week, it was so delicious. The chicken was so flavorful and tender that the meat just falls off the bone. The green chili was tangy and spicy enough... superb pairing with the chicken. The rice was also not the standard white rice but very fragrant ginger rice. Overall super value for money and super yummy. Shall try their fried chicken set soon.
The food was amazing! Such tender chicken, crispy (but not oily) begedil and flavourful beef rendang! The nuggets and mozzarella cheese sticks were also a big hit with my kid. Thanks again!
